verbs.description: skidmore symposium starts with film on fbi surveillance skidmore college john b moore documentary studies [V: collaborative] mdocs weekend - long documentary symposium exploring the theme of surveillance kicked off thursday with keynote speaker algerian - american journalist and filmmaker assia boundaoui i wanted to pick a theme that created a conversation around something that has been and currently is more than ever a great impact on our society said sarah friedland director of the storytellers institute of mdocs hasan elahia skidmore tang museum mdocs bridgeview illinois sarah friedland assia boundaoui rabab haj yahya saratoga springs new york federal bureau of investigation john b moore
